Beta distribution

Source: vignettes/Distributions-Beta.Rmd
Distributions-Beta.Rmd

Probability density function:

f(x)=xŒ±‚àí1(1‚àíx)Œ≤‚àí1‚Ñ¨(Œ±,Œ≤)f(x) = \frac{x^{\alpha-1}(1-x)^{\beta-1}} {\mathcal{B}(\alpha,\beta)} with Œ±\alpha and Œ≤\beta two shape parameters and ‚Ñ¨\mathcal B beta function.

Cumulative distribution function:

F(x)=‚à´0xyŒ±‚àí1(1‚àíy)Œ≤‚àí1dy‚Ñ¨(Œ±,Œ≤)=‚Ñ¨(x;Œ±,Œ≤)F(x) = \frac{\int_{0}^{x} y^{\alpha-1}(1-y)^{\beta-1}dy} {\mathcal{B}(\alpha,\beta)} =\mathcal{B}(x; \alpha,\beta) with ‚Ñ¨(x;Œ±,Œ≤)\mathcal B (x; \alpha,\beta) incomplete beta function.

Log-likelihood function:

L(Œ±,Œ≤;X)=‚àëi[(Œ±‚àí1)ln(x)+(Œ≤‚àí1)ln(1‚àíx)‚àíln‚Ñ¨(Œ±,Œ≤)]L(\alpha,\beta;X)=\sum_i\left[ (\alpha-1)\ln(x)+(\beta-1)\ln(1-x)-\ln \mathcal{B}(\alpha,\beta) \right]

Score function vector:

V(Œº,œÉ;X)=(‚àÇL‚àÇŒ±‚àÇL‚àÇŒ≤)=‚àëi(œà(0)(Œ±+Œ≤)‚àíœà(0)(Œ±)+ln‚Å°(x)œà(0)(Œ±+Œ≤)‚àíœà(0)(Œ≤)+ln‚Å°(x))V(\mu,\sigma;X) =\left( \begin{array}{c} \frac{\partial L}{\partial \alpha} \\ \frac{\partial L}{\partial \beta} \end{array} \right) =\sum_i \left( \begin{array}{c} \psi^{(0)}(\alpha+\beta)-\psi^{(0)}(\alpha)+\ln(x) \\ \psi^{(0)}(\alpha+\beta)-\psi^{(0)}(\beta)+\ln(x) \end{array} \right) with œà(0)\psi^{(0)} being log-gamma function.

Observed information matrix:

ùí•(Œº,œÉ;X)=(œà(1)(Œ±)‚àíœà(1)(Œ±+Œ≤)‚àíœà(1)(Œ±+Œ≤)‚àíœà(1)(Œ±+Œ≤)œà(1)(Œ≤)‚àíœà(1)(Œ±+Œ≤))\mathcal J (\mu,\sigma;X)= \left( \begin{array}{cc} \psi^{(1)}(\alpha)-\psi^{(1)}(\alpha+\beta) & -\psi^{(1)}(\alpha+\beta) \\ -\psi^{(1)}(\alpha+\beta) & \psi^{(1)}(\beta)-\psi^{(1)}(\alpha+\beta) \end{array} \right) with œà(1)\psi^{(1)} being digamma function.
